analysis.description:
Reentrancy in PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#353-377):
	External calls:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaised)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#367-369)
	- tokensBought = getToken().balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#369-371)
	External calls sending eth:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaised)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#367-369)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensBought (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#369-371)

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#353-377) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#353-377) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0
PreICOProxyBuyer.getState (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#489-504) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleBase.finalize (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#726-735):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#732-735)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#735)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleBase.investInternal (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#654-716):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#658-670)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#674-678)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#694)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#692-694)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleBase.investInternal (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#654-716):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#658-670)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#674-678)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#694-696)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#696)

PreICOProxyBuyer.claim (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#410-437) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-getToken().transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#432-433)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleBase.CrowdsaleBase (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#614-638):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#628-629)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#634)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#636-638)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#629)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#632)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleBase.investInternal (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#654-716):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#658-670)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#674-678)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#683-686)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#682)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#686-688)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#962-979):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#967-968)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#971-972)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#975-978)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#970-971)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#970)

CrowdsaleBase.getState (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#849-883) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#868-883)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#860-883)

CrowdsaleBase.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#514-516)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#22-23)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0xc7a5b1ef756b92373d320d13f0f775849358c4ef.sol#96)
